mapper.insert: insert into T_FILE_PROCESS_RESULT (SETTLE_DATE, ZIP_FILE_NAME, ZIP_FILE_TYPE, CRAD_TYPE, ERROR_FILE_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, RESULT_CODE, RESULT_MSG, INVEST_NOTES, INVEST_AMOUNT, CONSUME_NOTES, CONSUME_AMOUNT) values (#{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipFileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cradType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{investAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{consumeNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{consumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into T_FILE_PROCESS_RESULT
SETTLE_DATE,
ZIP_FILE_NAME,
ZIP_FILE_TYPE,
CARD_TYPE,
ERROR_FILE_NAME,
START_TIME,
END_TIME,
RESULT_CODE,
RESULT_MSG,
INVEST_NOTES,
INVEST_AMOUNT,
CONSUME_NOTES,
CONSUME_AMOUNT,
#{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zipFileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{errorFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSDATE,
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resultMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{investNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{investAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{consumeNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{consumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_FILE_PROCESS_RESULT SET
ERROR_FILE_NAME = #{errorFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RESULT_CODE = #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT_MSG = #{resultMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVEST_NOTES = #{investNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INVEST_AMOUNT = #{investAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONSUME_NOTES = #{consumeNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONSUME_AMOUNT= #{consumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REVISE_NOTES = #{reviseNotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REVISE_AMOUNT = #{reviseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
where ZIP_FILE_NAME = #{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(INVEST_NOTES) AS cpuCustomerInvestNotes, sum(INVEST_AMOUNT) AS cpuCustomerInvestAmount, sum(CONSUME_NOTES) AS cpuCustomerConsumerNotes, sum(CONSUME_AMOUNT) AS cpuCustomerConsumerAmount from T_FILE_PROCESS_RESULT WHERE SETTLE_DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RESULT_CODE in('0000','0030') and ZIP_FILE_TYPE ='03' and CARD_TYPE='01'

SELECT sum(INVEST_NOTES) AS mCardCustomerInvestNotes, sum(INVEST_AMOUNT) AS mCardCustomerInvestAmount, sum(CONSUME_NOTES) AS mCardCustomerConsumerNotes, sum(CONSUME_AMOUNT) AS mCardCustomerConsumerAmount from T_FILE_PROCESS_RESULT WHERE SETTLE_DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RESULT_CODE in('0000','0030') and ZIP_FILE_TYPE ='03' and CARD_TYPE='02'

SELECT sum(INVEST_NOTES) AS cpuInvestNotes, sum(INVEST_AMOUNT) AS cpuInvestAmount, sum(REVISE_NOTES) AS cpuInvestReviseNotes, sum(REVISE_AMOUNT) AS cpuInvestReviseAmount from T_FILE_PROCESS_RESULT WHERE SETTLE_DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RESULT_CODE in('0000','0030') and CARD_TYPE = '01' and ZIP_FILE_TYPE ='01'

SELECT sum(INVEST_NOTES) AS mCardInvestNotes, sum(INVEST_AMOUNT) AS mCardInvestAmount, sum(REVISE_NOTES) AS mCardInvestReviseNotes, sum(REVISE_AMOUNT) AS mCardInvestReviseAmount from T_FILE_PROCESS_RESULT WHERE SETTLE_DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RESULT_CODE in('0000','0030') and CARD_TYPE = '02' and ZIP_FILE_TYPE ='01'

SELECT sum(CONSUME_NOTES) AS cpuConsumeNotes, sum(CONSUME_AMOUNT) AS cpuConsumeAmount, sum(REVISE_NOTES) AS cpuConsumerReviseNotes, sum(REVISE_AMOUNT) AS cpuConsumerReviseAmount from T_FILE_PROCESS_RESULT WHERE SETTLE_DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RESULT_CODE in('0000','0030') and CARD_TYPE = '01' and ZIP_FILE_TYPE ='02'

SELECT sum(CONSUME_NOTES) AS mCardConsumeNotes, sum(CONSUME_AMOUNT) AS mCardConsumeAmount, sum(REVISE_NOTES) AS mCardConsumerReviseNotes, sum(REVISE_AMOUNT) AS mCardConsumerReviseAmount from T_FILE_PROCESS_RESULT WHERE SETTLE_DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RESULT_CODE in('0000','0030') and CARD_TYPE = '02' and ZIP_FILE_TYPE ='02'
